name: Wear that mask
description:
In this game on random time, people are spawned in the top part of the screen and are going down to the alert zone. 

If they reach the zone witouth wearing the mask they will became sick and will infect other people too.

You have to tap or click on people to wear the mask so they can be saved.

If a sick person reach the alert zone he/she will die and thats GAME OVER.
